main event: A round, reddish-yellow object, very small, appeared to be at high altitude, moving straight across the sky from north to south, and disappeared behind a building.
interesting points: The object was observed by a science class watching for an artificial satellite moon.
The object was estimated to be traveling at a speed between 1,400 and 1,800 mph.
The sighting was reported from Camp Hill, Alabama and lasted for about 15 seconds.
Multiple observers, including science instructors and students from the Camp Hill Military Academy, witnessed the object.
The report mentions checking with the Atlanta Filter Center, but no other sightings were reported in the area.
witnesses: science class, including instructors and students from the Camp Hill Military Academy
